was creating

ns that 
* the contructors of all tests are called before any tests are run=
, leading to some 
interesting issues if any initialization is done there i=
nstead of in setUp, 
* resources created in setUp and assigned to test clas=
s fields hang around until the end of 
the test run, kept alive by the suit=
e
* we get some very different behaviour running all tests in ant using for=
k=3Dtrue, compared

Now in junit 4 it =

c=
onstructor of each test instance is called just before @Before.
